languages.text: "Я рад, что вы приняли мое приглашение. Когда жертва идет на убой по собственной воле — без тени страха и сомнения — ее плоть остается нежной и сочной. До самого конца".

traits.locale_text: "Я рад, что вы приняли мое приглашение. Когда жертва идет на убой по собственной воле — без тени истраха и сомнения — ее плоть остается нежной и сочной. До самого конца".

languages.text: "I am pleased you have accepted my invitation. When the sacrifice welcomes the slaughter and comes to the butcher without fear, its flesh remains juicy and tender until the end."
languages.original_text: "Я рад, что вы приняли мое приглашение. Когда жертва идет на убой по собственной воле — без тени страха и сомнения — ее плоть остается нежной и сочной. До самого конца".

traits.locale_text: "I am pleased you accepted my invitation. When the prey welcomes the slaughter and comes to the butcher without fear, its flesh remains juicy and tender until the end."
"I am pleased you accepted my invitation. When the prey welcomes the slaughter and comes to the butcher without fear, its flesh remains juicy and tender until the end."
"I am pleased you accepted my invitation. When the prey welcomes the slaughter and comes to the butcher without fear, its flesh remains juicy and tender until the end."
"I am pleased you accepted my invitation. When the prey welcomes the slaughter and comes to the butcher without fear, its flesh remains juicy and tender until the end."
"I am pleased you have accepted my invitation. When the sacrifice welcomes the slaughter and comes to the butcher without fear, its flesh remains juicy and tender until the end."
"I am pleased you have accepted my invitation. When the sacrifice welcomes the slaughter and comes to the butcher without fear, its flesh remains juicy and tender until the end."

languages.text: “我很高兴你接受了我的邀请。当祭品迎接屠夫，毫无畏惧地走向屠场时，它的肉质就会始终保持鲜嫩多汁的状态，直至最后一刻。”
languages.original_text: "I am pleased you have accepted my invitation. When the sacrifice welcomes the slaughter and comes to the butcher without fear, its flesh remains juicy and tender until the end."

traits.locale_text: “我很高兴你接受了我的邀请。当祭品迎接屠夫，毫无畏惧地走向屠场时，它的肉质就会始终保持鲜嫩多汁的状态，直至最后一刻。”

languages.text: «Me agrada ver que ha aceptado mi invitación. Cuando el sacrificio acepta la matanza y camina hacia el carnicero sin temor, su carne es tierna y jugosa hasta el final».
languages.original_text: "I am pleased you have accepted my invitation. When the sacrifice welcomes the slaughter and comes to the butcher without fear, its flesh remains juicy and tender until the end."

traits.locale_text: «Me agrada ver que ha aceptado mi invitación. Cuando el sacrificio acepta la matanza y camina hacia el carnicero sin temor, su carne es tierna y jugosa hasta el final».

languages.text: 「私の招待を受けてくださり、嬉しく思います。生け贄が屠殺を喜んで受け入れて解体者に恐れなくその身を差し出せば、最後までずっと肉汁があふれる柔らかな肉となるのですよ」
languages.original_text: "I am pleased you have accepted my invitation. When the sacrifice welcomes the slaughter and comes to the butcher without fear, its flesh remains juicy and tender until the end."

traits.locale_text: 「私の招待を受けてくださり、嬉しく思います。生け贄が屠殺を喜んで受け入れて解体者に恐れなくその身を差し出せば、最後までずっと肉汁があふれる柔らかな肉となるのですよ」

languages.text: « Je suis ravi que vous ayez accepté mon invitation. Lorsque le sacrifice accepte la mort de bon cœur et s'approche du boucher sans crainte, sa chair reste tendre et juteuse jusqu'au bout. »
languages.original_text: "I am pleased you have accepted my invitation. When the sacrifice welcomes the slaughter and comes to the butcher without fear, its flesh remains juicy and tender until the end."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis ravi que vous ayez accepté mon invitation. Lorsque le sacrifice accepte la mort de bon cœur et s'approche du boucher sans crainte, sa chair reste tendre et juteuse jusqu'au bout. »

languages.text: "Es freut mich, dass Ihr meine Einladung annehmt. Wenn das Opfer die Schlachtung akzeptiert und ohne Furcht zum Schlachter tritt, bleibt sein Fleisch bis zum Schluss saftig und zart."
languages.original_text: "I am pleased you have accepted my invitation. When the sacrifice welcomes the slaughter and comes to the butcher without fear, its flesh remains juicy and tender until the end."

traits.locale_text: "Es freut mich, dass Ihr meine Einladung annehmt. Wenn das Opfer die Schlachtung akzeptiert und ohne Furcht zum Schlachter tritt, bleibt sein Fleisch bis zum Schluss saftig und zart."
